name: Tetris Clone (Jonyzim)
description:
Just a tetris clone made with p5 js.

How to play

  • A, D, left and right arrows - move the tetramino horizontally
  • W and up arrow - rotate the tetramino
  • S and down arrow - makes it fall faster
  • Click the screen to pause the game

Some cool features

  • The highscore stays on "record" even if you refresh the page.
  • The game on the menu is randomly generated and starts the first game.
